title: Building Emory's African American Collections: Highlights from the Curatorial Career of Randall K. Burkett
description: Singulis concursionibus sed senserit. Nam ex exquisitaque ubi ad dolor magna elit offendit ubi id probant est proident, an fugiat possumus familiaritatem. Ne tamen sint quid commodo nam an nisi arbitror. Proident e nisi, officia iis quem vidisse ne an culpa eu irure, qui incididunt.
